# Fix vax data

```{r}
here::here("data", "vax-data.csv") %>% 
  read_csv()
```

```{r}
left_join(
  here::here("data", "vax-data.csv") %>%
    read_csv(),
  here::here(
    "data",
    "COVID-19_Vaccinations_in_the_United_States_County.csv"
  ) %>%
    read_csv() %>%
    janitor::clean_names() %>%
    filter(date == "11/30/2021") %>%
    select(fips, series_complete_pop_pct),
  by = "fips"
)
```
